author: abehazbunjr
title: Dropnir: Pool-Powered CNFT Markets
description: There are not enough levers available to stake pool operators to differentiate themselves, engage with audiences and onboard new users.
solution: SPOs and NFT projects can grow by blending them as "Art Pools". The art itself is the pool benefactor, incentivizing holding over flipping.
experience: A Plutus student with 14 years in competitive e-commerce, I was often leading strategy development, automation and execution for brands.
